AverageValue.hh

00001 #ifndef __AverageValue_hh__
00002 #define __AverageValue_hh__ 1
00003 
00004 #include <cmath>
00005 
00018 template<class T>
00019 class AverageValue{
00020  public:
00021   AverageValue():_num(0), _sum(0), _sum2(0){}
00022   ~AverageValue(){}
00023 
00024 
00025   //  add value to be considered for next call to mean/RMS calculation
00026   AverageValue& addValue(T e){
00027     _sum += e;
00028     _sum2 += e*e;
00029     ++_num;
00030     return (*this);
00031   }
00032 
00033 
00034   //  reset members
00035   AverageValue& reset(){
00036     _sum = 0;
00037     _sum2 = 0;
00038     _num = 0;
00039     return (*this);
00040   }
00041 
00042 
00043   //  return functions for private members
00044   const unsigned int getNumberOfValues() const { return _num; }
00045 
00046   const T getSum() const { return _sum; }
00047 
00048   const T getSumOfSquares() const { return _sum2; }
00049 
00050 
00051   //  value and uncertainty of mean
00052   const T getMean() const { 
00053     return _num>0 
00054       ? _sum / (T)_num 
00055       : 0; 
00056   }
00057 
00058   const T getMeanUncertainty() const {
00059     return _num>0 
00060       ? (T)getRMS() / sqrt( (T)_num ) 
00061       : 0; 
00062   }
00063 
00064   //  value and uncertainty of RMS
00065   const T getRMS() const { 
00066     return getMeanOfSquares() <= getMeanSquared() ? 0 : 
00067       (T)sqrt( getMeanOfSquares() - getMeanSquared() ); 
00068   }
00069   const T getRMSUncertainty() const {
00070     return 2*getMeanUncertainty();
00071   }
00072 
00073  protected:
00074   //  internal calculations done in double precision independent of T
00075   const double getSumSquared() const { 
00076     return (double)_sum*(double)_sum; 
00077   }
00078 
00079   const double getMeanSquared() const { 
00080     return _num>0 ? getSumSquared()/(double)(_num*_num) : 0; 
00081   }
00082 
00083   const double getMeanOfSquares() const { 
00084     return _num>0 ? _sum2/(double)_num : 0; 
00085   }
00086   
00087  private:
00088   //  data members
00089   unsigned int _num;
00090   T _sum;
00091   T _sum2;
00092 
00093 }; // class ConfigurationAverage

00095 #endif
